Question
========
A researcher asked 120 people in an online survey about their favourite
type of TV programme: news/ current affairs, game shows, sports
programmes, soap operas, or other. Respondents were only allowed to tick
one answer option. The researcher is curious to know whether the
preference for the type of TV programme depends on a person's gender.
Which statistical test would then be most suitable?

Answerlist
----------
* 
* One-sample t-test
* Independent t-test
* Dependent t-test
* Chi-squared test

Solution
========










Answerlist

* False
* False
* False
* True
